                  \usepackage{caption}

```{r, include=FALSE}
options(tinytex.verbose = TRUE)
options(knitr.table.format = "latex")
```

```{r eval = TRUE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
S1 <- read.csv("C:/Users/banburymorganr/Dropbox (Smithsonian)/GitHub/Global_Productivity/manuscript/S1.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE, check.names = FALSE)
kable(S1, format = "latex", booktabs = TRUE, caption = "Supporting Information Table 1 (S1): ", escape = F)%>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = c("scale_down", "hold_position")) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "5cm") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "2cm") %>%
  column_spec(3:4, width = "7cm") 
```
